TypeSignature.Value: public class Component : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.ComponentModel.IComponent
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Component extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable
Public Class Component Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IComponent, IDisposable
public ref class Component : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::IComponent
type Component = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IComponent interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 介面的基底實作，並啟用應用程式之間的物件共用。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for the interface and enables object sharing between applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由參考該封送處理為 common language runtime 中的所有元件的基底類別。 is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference. 可遠端執行，且衍生自類別。 is remotable and derives from the class. 提供實作介面。 provides an implementation of the interface. 提供的實作，傳值封送處理。The provides an implementation of that marshals by value. 您可以託管中實作的任何物件介面，而且您可以查詢，並從其容器中取得的服務。You can host a in any object that implements the interface, and you can query and get services from its container. 容器會建立針對每個它所包含。The container creates an for each it contains. 容器使用的網站來管理而且會由與其容器通訊。The container uses the site to manage the and is used by the to communicate with its container. A應該釋出資源明確地呼叫其方法，而不需等到自動記憶體管理的隱含呼叫透過方法。A should release resources explicitly by calls to its method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the method. 當處置中的所有元件也會處置。When a is disposed, all components within the are also disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRaiseEvents As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool CanRaiseEvents { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出元件是否能引發事件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.

value.span: 如果元件可以引發事件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the component can raise events; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設實作永遠傳回`true`。The default implementation of this property always returns `true`. 類別繼承自類別應該覆寫這個屬性，以讓您能夠停用的事件引發。Classes that inherit from the class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events. 例如，在類別，如果控制項正在裝載 ActiveX 控制項，為屬性會傳回`false`ActiveX 控制項是否已凍結其事件。For example, in the class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.

para.span: 如果您覆寫衍生類別中的，這個方法，並將它變更為傳回，則所傳回的集合屬性會傳回事件。

span.span: If you override this method in a deriving class and change it to return , the collection returned by the property returns for an event.

para.span: 事件可以仍新增或移除集合中，但集合屬性一律會傳回。

span.span: Events can still be added and removed from the collection, but the collection's property will always return .

span.span: The that contains the , if any, or if the is not encapsulated in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在容器中的元件會追蹤在先進先出清單中，也會定義在容器內的元件的順序。The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container. 最後加入的元件是在清單中的最後一個元件。The last component added is the last component in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計模式指標會儲存在; 因此，如果沒有與其相關聯，這個屬性的值是`false`。The design mode indicator is stored in the ; therefore, if the does not have an associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler

summary.span: 當此元件由 方法的呼叫處置時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立 委派時，您要識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about the event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Events As EventHandlerList
protected: property System::ComponentModel::EventHandlerList ^ Events { System::ComponentModel::EventHandlerList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得附加在這個 上的事件處理常式清單。

span.span: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this .
An that provides the delegates for this component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋出 Unmanaged 資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A會有如果加入至並指派給它。A will have an if it has been added to an and the assigns an to it. 負責指派至。The is responsible for assigning the to the . 變更元件的值並不一定會變更站台名稱指派給。Changing the value of the component's does not necessarily change the name of the site the is assigned to. 屬性應該僅設定。The property should be set only by an . 屬性值，則`null`如果移除從其。The property value is `null` if the is removed from its . 指派`null`給這個屬性不一定會移除從。Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the from the . A可能會或可能沒有名稱。A might or might not have a name. 如果是指定名稱，名稱必須是唯一的其他內的物件及其。If a is given a name, the name must be unique among other objects within its . 的名稱儲存; 因此，您只可以命名有與其相關聯。The stores the name of the ; therefore, you can only name a if it has an associated with it.
